verses.name: Luke 13:16
verses.text: And ought not this woman, being a daughter of Abraham, whom Satan hath bound, lo, these eighteen years, be loosed from this bond on the sabbath day?

verses.name: Luke 13:17
verses.text: And when he had said these things, all his adversaries were ashamed: and all the people rejoiced for all the glorious things that were done by him.

verses.name: Luke 13:18
verses.text: Then said he, Unto what is the kingdom of God like? and whereunto shall I resemble it?
